attributes.background: With knife crime at a all time high.it’s about time we bring back stop and search

rejection.details:
Police Officers already have the power to stop and search someone if they have ‘reasonable grounds’ to suspect that someone is carrying certain things, including a weapon. We're therefore not exactly sure what further action you'd like to see. You can find out more about the police's current stop and search powers here: https://www.gov.uk/police-powers-to-stop-and-search-your-rights

We currently have this petition open about knife crime which you may wish to sign: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618505
